title: iMac 27 Zoll Ende 2013 Grafikkarte GeForce GT 755 1024MB graphical problems
message:
hi friends,

I got from client this machine. Is it possible to have an grafic problem ? I still didint have newer machine from imac after 2011.

thanks

title: iMac 27 Zoll Ende 2013 Grafikkarte GeForce GT 755 1024MB graphical problems
iMac 27 Zoll Ende 2013 Grafikkarte GeForce GT 755 1024MB graphical problems
message: Does it do the same thing when you hook up and external monitor? If so, yes, it is possible. If no, then you likely have a broken LCD.
